Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Funeducationalapps - "Dr. Panda Hospital is a top fun educational game app. It helps kids learn about basic medical procedures and anatomy via a great friendly interface"

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ TheiPhoneMom - "If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re looking for a new app for your 2-6 year old then Dr. PandaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Hospital will not disappoint."

What kid doesn't think about being a vet or doctor?
HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s their chance to help Dr. Panda take care of animals at Dr. PandaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Hospital. Your kid will greet 8 different animals in the waiting room, help them to their hospital beds, discover and treat their ailments - all while learning sequencing!

- 10 - fun mini games allow kids to treat stomachs, connect broken bones, measure blood pressure, and many more activities that engage your child in educational role-play.

Tap on various items to explore the interactive hospital of Dr. Panda! Swipe the trash into the bin, open a window or tap on the radio to make the animals feel comfortable and happy! You child will not only like our funny mini games, they will also learn taking care of animals with the realistic and interactive game play!

Dr. PandaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Hospital is ideal for kids ages 2 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 6 that are naturally curious about basic medical procedures and anatomy.

They will enjoy the many animals that come to the hospital and the following varied activities:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Treat stomachs, eyes, ears, mouth/teeth
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Measure blood pressure
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Apply ointment to treat chicken pox
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjust broken bones
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Retrieve swallowed items
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Deliver injections
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sort equipment into Dr. PandaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s medical carrying case
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keep waiting room and patient rooms clean

Fun animations and sounds are similar to the Dr. Panda, Teach Me! effects that have made so many kids giggle with delight. Your kid is also rewarded with animal stickers as they complete the games.
With so many animals and games, children can play however they want, for as long as they want, and stay engaged.

We are dedicated to kids, so we do NOT use any in-app purchases or third-party advertising:
Dr. PandaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Hospital is certified by the kidSAFEÃ‚Â® Seal Program. To learn more, click on the seal or go to www.kidsafeseal.com

A great educational app for kids!

Check out Ã¢â‚¬Å“Dr. Panda, Teach Me!Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½, an interactive game for kids ages 2 to 5 with cute animations, wacky sounds and 10 educational mini games which engage your kids in a range of languages and fundamental skills such as recognizing colors, shapes, sizes, differences as well as matching, memory, counting and logic.
